Summary: Incorrect result of addition (+) for three-digit numbers in calculator
Description: Calculator gives wrong math result addition (+) of three-digit numbers (444+444=903). It is math Incorrect result
Steps_to_reproduce: <1>Run calc</1> <2>click "4" button three times</2> <3>click "+" button</3> <4>click "4" button three times</4> <5>click "=" button</5>
